ohuge piya di. di. obesekara deshiya waidya widyalaye kathikacharyawarayek wu athara anagarika dharmapala thumage anugamikayek wiya. 1955 di peradeniya wishwa widyalayen ingrisi sandaha mulika upadhiya labagath ohu warak ohugema usas adhyapanaya gana pawasuye wamanshikayan pawa oksfard yamata pasu noba yugayaka thama thula wu yatath wijitha wirodhaya nisa oksfard saha landan sandaha labuna shishyathwa kihipayakma prathikshepa kala bawaya.
manda wirawansha mahatha kiyana lesa amarikawen genwana siyalu de prathikshepa karannata apata bari ee samangama antharjalaye da thakshanaye da boho kawulu apata wasi yana bawini.
widyathmaka siddhantha wagema paryeshana rashiyakuth me athara pradhana we.

paudgalika anshaye bahutharayak wadakarana janathawa eekarashikara merata paudgalika anshaya niyojanayakala sanwidhitha pa්radhanathama wruththiya samithiya lesatath, rate sesu wruththiya samithi walata aadarshayak wemin siyalu nagarika kamkaruwan niyojanaya karana padanamin yuth winayagaruka, pa්rathipaththi garuka, kamkaru panthi sanwidhanayak lesatath siemyuwa pathkarana ladde bala sahodaraya wisini.

mata labuna web lipinayan walin kisiyam sewumak kalahama labena prathipala sathutu dayaka nam mata adala kotu salakunak thula mage chandaya satahan kalayuthu una, inpasu shri lankawe ma samaga me wadasatahanata thoragath anek pudgalayan 9 deneku samaga adahas palakala yuthu una me adahas walin obata therunoth obe adahasa waradiyi kiyala oba ta niwaradi kirimata awasthawa labenawa mehidi pudgalayan sama samawa ekaga wi saha wirudda wi aththam ehi sitina ihala niladariya (
me sambandhayen wenath parshawayan wisin me wanawita ohuta hrudayabadhayak athi wi athi bawata gena yana pracharayanhi kisidu sathyathawayak nomathi bawa da ohu wadiduratath pawasa sitiyeya.

wisheshayen aayurweda shalya waidya widyawa thulata ema thakshanika sahaya labagena atha.

mosul,ninawe gana kiwwe kalif rajya sadaha darunu satan awiluna pradesha eewa nisa.ninnawe kiyanne asiriyanu adhirajyaye aganuwara.ek semitik gothrayak kantharaya le walin pongawala iwara wela hathi arina kotama anik semitik gothraya le waguruwanna patan ganne hath dawasak kanda nathiwa siti ballekuta bath piganak labuna wageyi.samakalinawa loke kisima manawa samajayaka mewani athi darunu wadha hinsa ha samulaghathana siduwa naha.owunge darunu kamath ekkama yana anek gathiya thamayi adhika dewa bhakthiya.ee ekkama adhanagrahiwa sesu adahili winasha kala yuthuyayi sithima.yudewwange yahwe (yehowa ) gana bayibalaye palamuwani giwisume thiyana dewal balanna.yudew dewiya pamanak noweyi anek dewiwaruth me wagema le pipasithayan.islamaya bihiwune mewani samajayaka.ee wage samajayaka karunawa maithriya thamayi ath kakul kapana eka,dombaakara wala ellana eka.eeka eeta wada ruduru bhishanayakata sapekshawa loku karunawak .
